title: Combinatorics
description: Fundamental combinatorial structures including hypergraphs, transversal sets, colorings, Sperner families, intersecting families, packings and coverings, perfect graphs, and Ramsey theory.  Algebraic and topological methods, applications.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MATH 4022 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
